document.full_text: although he was eliminated from "american idol's" season 10 competition thursday night, paul mcdonald is still smiling a day later. after performing bob seger's "old time rock 'n' roll" on wednesday's episode, the nashville-based rock singer received the fewest votes of the eight contestants and bid farewell with a cover of rod stewart's "maggie may."
document.title: ousted "idol" paul mcdonald opens up about the show
lines_and_colors: although he was eliminated from "american idol's" season 10 competition thursday night, paul mcdonald is still smiling a day later. after performing bob seger's "old time rock 'n' roll" on wednesday's episode, the nashville-based rock singer received the fewest votes of the eight contestants and bid farewell with a cover of rod stewart's "maggie may."
